name: Nastran Output File
summary: Output file created by MSC Nastran, a program that enables you to test the integrity of different structures such as buildings or spacecraft; generated by DMAP alters, which act like commands to extract information (like a matrix); can be written in Binary or ASCII format; contains vectors and matrices of that can be analyzed and output as a structure array by different Nastran readers.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
